original_title: Adolphe Appia le Visionnaire de l'Invisible
overview: The life and work of stage designer ADOLPHE APPIA, originator of the most profound agitations in contemporary theatre. Through the dynamic alternation of animated drawings and choreographies specially conceived for the film, we discover the steps of his artistic evolution.
tagline: Appia foresaw the deepest revolutions of contemporary theatre
title: Adolphe Appia Visionary of Invisible
